urlset:
http://www.zabij10prasat.cz/ hourly 0.6
http://www.zabij10prasat.cz/shoutbox hourly 0.3
http://www.zabij10prasat.cz/info monthly 0.8
http://www.zabij10prasat.cz/reactions hourly 0.5
http://www.zabij10prasat.cz/media hourly 0.2
http://www.zabij10prasat.cz/users 0.3
{% for article in articles %}
http://www.zabij10prasat.cz{{article.url}} {{article.lastmod.isoformat()}} 0.9
{% endfor %} {% for user in users %}
http://www.zabij10prasat.cz{{user.url}} {{(user.edit_timestamp or user.timestamp or user.articles[-1].timestamp).isoformat()}} 0.7
{% endfor %}
